title: Cocaine induced myocardial ischemia.
abst: We report a case of myocardial ischemia induced by cocaine. The ischemia probably induced by coronary artery spasm was reversed by nitroglycerin and calcium blocking agents.
title_plus_abst: Cocaine induced myocardial ischemia. We report a case of myocardial ischemia induced by cocaine. The ischemia probably induced by coronary artery spasm was reversed by nitroglycerin and calcium blocking agents.
split_sentence: We report a case of myocardial ischemia induced by cocaine.
The ischemia probably induced by coronary artery spasm was reversed by nitroglycerin and calcium blocking agents.
